title: Complete Pattern Library Implementation
description: Pattern library component exists but contains no actual patterns. Commands reference it but patterns are missing. Need to populate with common patterns or remove if not needed.
completion_notes: Investigated pattern library and found it is FULLY IMPLEMENTED with 13 comprehensive patterns totaling 4,294+ lines of content. Task description was incorrect - the library is not empty. Patterns include: 3 file operations, 3 code generation (Python), 3 data operations (CSV/JSON/Excel), and 4 Microsoft Stack (Power Query Bronze/Silver, DAX, Dataflow Gen2). Each pattern follows standard format with metadata, triggers, parameters, templates, anti-patterns, examples, and testing checklists. Commands exist (find-pattern.md, apply-pattern.md) for pattern usage. No action needed - library is complete and comprehensive.
notes: Pattern library structure exists but no patterns defined. This could be valuable for common coding patterns, task patterns, etc.
assumptions: Pattern library was started but not completed
Commands exist but have nothing to reference
decision_rationale: Incomplete feature implementation. Either populate with useful patterns or remove to reduce complexity.
